snippet: Detroit Manager Jim Leyland is confident that the overwhelming positives of Miguel Cabrera’s bat will more than compensate for any negatives of his glove as he shifts from first to third.
abstract: Detroit Tigers Miguel Cabrera switches his position from first base to third to make room for Prince Fielder; manager Jim Leyland is confident that the overwhelming positives of Cabrera's bat will more than compensate for any negatives from his glove; Cabrera arrived at camp slimmed down and ready improve his defense.
lead_paragraph: Detroit Manager Jim Leyland is confident that the overwhelming positives of Miguel Cabrera’s bat will more than compensate for any negatives of his glove as he shifts from first to third.

headline.seo: For Better or Worse, Tigers Shift Cabrera to Third
headline.main: For Better or Worse, Cabrera Takes Over at Third
headline.print_headline: For Better or Worse, Cabrera Takes Over at Third
